snippet.title: Robots at Midnight - Official Reveal Trailer
snippet.description:
Welcome to Yob! Unleash your inner hero in the thrilling world of our newly announced game: "Robots at Midnight"  Dive into intense combat, unravel deep lore, and explore the journey of Zoe, a scrappy hero on a quest for identity and destiny.

Wishlist Now and be part of this epic Action RPG adventure! https://store.steampowered.com/app/2623040

Want to be a part of the development journey? Join our brand new Finish Line Games community Discord to get behind the scenes looks, give feedback throughout development, or discuss our previous titles!
Join now: http://discord.gg/9ZYrpfNZDK
